# Illya's Finance, Crypto & Macro Thoughts

Microblog and article threads by Illya Gerasymchuk on finance, money, gold & silver, global liquidity, Bitcoin & crypto, DeFi, AI and law & financial markets.

## Author
- Name: Illya Gerasymchuk
- URL: https://illya.sh/
- Contact: mailto:hello@illya.sh
